name: Cyber Colosseum
description:
Multiplatform project developed by 2nd year students of the Games Development course (2021/2022).

Developed by:

  • Bernardo Boffa-Molinar
  • Gonçalo Marques
  • Sheehan Sunil

Controls:

  • A - Walk left
  • D - Walk right
  • S - Drop Down through platforms
  • Space or W - Jump
  • E - Pick up Weapons
  • Right Mouse Button - Pulse Grenade
  • Mouse Scroll Wheel - Change Melee to Ranged Attack
  • Mouse Position - Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack
  • Left Shift - Blink
  • Esc - Pause/Unpause

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
